data.comment: The match is underway at Renato Dall'Ara.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
In the minute 1, Parma Calcio drive upfield and Gervinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bologna defender.
Can Parma Calcio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Throw-in for Parma Calcio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 2, Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Parma Calcio attack but Gaston Brugman's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
In the minute 4, In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Throw-in high up the field for Parma Calcio in Bologna.
In the minute 5, Parma Calcio are coming forward and Juraj Kucka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Bologna's Roberto Soriano is whistled for offside at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 8, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Parma Calcio.
Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Aaron Hickey.
In the minute 12, Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aaron Hickey for Bologna is back on the field again.
Paolo Valeri awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Bologna's Roberto Soriano gets in a shot on goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 16, Goal! Roberto Soriano heads Bologna into a 1-0 lead.
Danilo with an assist there.
Paolo Valeri signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Bologna's half.
In the minute 17, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Free kick Parma Calcio.
In the minute 20, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Parma Calcio.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Parma Calcio in the half of Bologna.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Bologna.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 23, Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 25, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Paolo Valeri signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Bologna's half.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roberto Soriano puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio pushes forward through Yann Karamoh, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 36, Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Parma Calcio.
In Bologna Bologna's Musa Barrow is caught offside.
Free kick Parma Calcio.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Bologna.
Throw-in Bologna.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andrea Poli is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 43, Bologna's Andrea Poli looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Bologna.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Bologna.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Paolo Valeri awards Bologna a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Paolo Valeri awards Bologna a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Goal! Bologna extend their lead to 3-0 through Andreas Olsen.
That's a fine assist from Roberto Soriano.
In the minute 58, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Bologna.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Jacopo Dezi with Luca Siligardi.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Bologna in the half of Parma Calcio.
Juraj Kucka (Parma Calcio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Paolo Valeri signals a Bologna throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Juraj Kucka of Parma Calcio gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Throw-in Parma Calcio.
In the minute 64, Gary Medel is replacing Andrea Poli for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 67, Hernani puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-1.
Great play from Gaston Brugman to set up the goal.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Parma Calcio make their second substitution with Mattia Sprocati replacing Gervinho.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Vincent Laurini (Parma Calcio) gets a yellow card.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
In the minute 75, Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Musa Barrow gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bologna.
Simone Iacoponi (Parma Calcio) is red-carded and dismissed.
In the minute 77, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Bologna just outside Parma Calcio's area.
Bologna drives forward and Musa Barrow gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 80, Stefano Denswil is replacing Aaron Hickey for the home team.
Nicola Sansone is on a sub for Musa Barrow for Bologna.
Parma Calcio are pushing forward but Hernani's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Fabio Liverani is making the team's third substitution at Renato Dall'Ara with Kastriot Dermaku replacing Juraj Kucka.
In the minute 81, Fabio Liverani (Parma Calcio) is making a fourth substitution, with Andrea Adorante replacing Vincent Laurini.
Bologna's Nicola Sansone is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, The away team have replaced Gaston Brugman with Alberto Grassi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Fabio Liverani.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 85, Nicola Sansone (Bologna) has received a first yellow card.
Bologna push forward at Renato Dall'Ara and Rodrigo Palacio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Parma Calcio defence.
In the minute 88, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Paolo Valeri awards the away team a throw-in.
At Renato Dall'Ara the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Bologna's Federico Santander misses with an attempt on goal.
Paolo Valeri awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Bologna are coming forward and Riccardo Orsolini gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-1.
Goal! Rodrigo Palacio extends Bologna's lead to 4-1.
Gary Medel instrumental with a fine assist.
The home team replace Rodrigo Palacio with Federico Santander.
Riccardo Orsolini is on a sub for Andreas Olsen for Bologna.
